TEXT.English: National Theatre
TEXT.Chinese: 国家大剧院

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] increases the cultural output of the city as well as increasing the city's happiness. It increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]国家大剧院[COLOR_REVERT] increases the cultural output of the city as well as increasing the city's happiness. It increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: National Gallery
TEXT.Chinese: 国家美术馆

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Gallery[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's cultural output and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]国家美术馆[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's cultural output and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Park[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the health in your city. It also provides a free specialist for each [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forest Preserve[COLOR_REVERT] in its city radius and increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]国家公园[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the health in your city. It also provides a free specialist for each [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forest Preserve[COLOR_REVERT] in its city radius and increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Olympic Park
TEXT.Chinese: 奥林匹克公园

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Olympic Park[COLOR_REVERT] begins a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]奥林匹克公园[COLOR_REVERT] begins a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Secret Service
TEXT.Chinese: 特勤局

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Secret Service[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's espionage output and gives experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in it's city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]特勤局[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's espionage output and gives experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in it's city.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Cross[COLOR_REVERT] gives all units built in its city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medic I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion, and it increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]红十字会[COLOR_REVERT]使所在城市组建的单位获得[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]医疗一级[COLOR_REVERT]晋升，并提升该城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: Trading Company
TEXT.Chinese: 贸易公司

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trading Company[COLOR_REVERT] generates income for each city with Trading Company has spread to. It generates health for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT] and happiness for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merhant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]贸易公司[COLOR_REVERT] generates income for each city with Trading Company has spread to. It generates health for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT] and happiness for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merhant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Triumphal Arch
TEXT.Chinese: 凯旋门

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Is automatically built on achievement of 2 Historical Goals out of 3[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]在完成3个历史目标中的2个之后自动建造[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Triumphal Arch[COLOR_REVERT] begins a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's production when creating military units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]凯旋门[COLOR_REVERT] begins a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's production when creating military units.

TEXT.English: Stock Exchange
TEXT.Chinese: 证券交易所

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stock Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's production of wealth and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]证券交易所[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's production of wealth and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Ironworks
TEXT.Chinese: 钢铁厂

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's production if that city has access to coal and/or iron, but also adds unhealthiness. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]钢铁厂[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's production if that city has access to coal and/or iron, but also adds unhealthiness. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Manufactory
TEXT.Chinese: 制造厂

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Manufactories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's production and increase trade route yield.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]制造厂[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's production and increase trade route yield.

TEXT.English: Museum
TEXT.Chinese: 博物馆

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Musea[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output. They also increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate depending on the culture level.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]博物馆[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output. They also increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate depending on the culture level.

TEXT.English: Armoury
TEXT.Chinese: 兵工厂

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Armouries[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]兵工厂[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production.

TEXT.English: National College
TEXT.Chinese: 国立大学

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National College[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the scientific output of its city. It also allows you to change three citizens into scientists and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]国立大学[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the scientific output of its city. It also allows you to change three citizens into scientists and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: National Monument
TEXT.Chinese: 国家纪念碑

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Monument[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the rate at which its city produces [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT], particularly [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artists[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]国家纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the rate at which its city produces [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT], particularly [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artists[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Military Academy
TEXT.Chinese: 军事学院

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academy[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production, grants the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leadership[COLOR_REVERT] promotion to all units and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]军事学院[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production, grants the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leadership[COLOR_REVERT] promotion to all units and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Central Bank
TEXT.Chinese: 中央银行

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Central Bank[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's wealth output and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]中央银行[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's wealth output and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
